description: Relive a rain-ruined fourth day in which Stuart Broad is given a guard of honour before Australia start well in run-chase.
title: The Ashes LIVE: England vs Australia, fifth Test day four, Kia Oval
title_page: The Ashes LIVE: England vs Australia, fifth Test day four, Kia Oval - score, commentary, video highlights & updates - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Well, that was a frustrating day. The forecast is looking a little better for tomorrow, so we are staying hopeful.
We will be back with you from 8:00 BST tomorrow for all the reaction.
For now, here's Stephan Shemilt's match report from The Oval, and we look forward to you joining us in the morning!
Close of play - Aus 135-0
And there it is.
Play has been abandoned at The Oval on day four because of the rain, and the amount of time that it would take to get the ground ready again even if it does dry up.
Australia will resume tomorrow on 135-0, trailing England by 249 runs.
Post
Over on Test Match Special, where they (like me) are filling time while the rain falls, they are also discussing the Team of the Ashes with BBC Sport website fan favourite Matt Henry.
A reminder of it:
1. Usman Khawaja (picked in 97 % of teams)
2. Zak Crawley (96%)
3. Marnus Labuschagne (54%)
4. Joe Root (95%)
5. Harry Brook (53%)
6. Ben Stokes (92%)
7. Jonny Bairstow (56%)
8. Chris Woakes (62%)
9. Pat Cummins (61%)
10. Mark Wood (87%)
11. Stuart Broad (84%)
Post
BBC Test Match Special
On Test Match Special now, Jonathan Agnew is chatting to Glenn McGrath and Michael Atherton about the duo's Ashes battles, which saw McGrath dismiss the England batter a record 19 times.
You can listen on BBC Sounds or using the audio icon at the top of this page.
Post
We've also been talking about the Team of the Series, as selected by the BBC Sport readers.
Usman Khawaja, the series' leading run-scorer, was the most-selected player with 97% people choosing him.
Jonny Bairstow over Alex Carey is also causing a bit of a stir on our socials, but you can still have a go at selecting your team here if you want to make any changes.
